---
title: "Calculate range of digest quantification"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
---

Access database.
```{r echo = F, message=FALSE}
source("../genomics/scripts/lab_helpers.R")
lab <- read_db("Laboratory")
library(knitr)
```
Find the range of quantifications
```{r}
# pull in all table
# extr <- lab %>% dbReadTable("extraction") %>% collect()
digs <- lab %>% tbl("digest") %>% collect()
# ligs <- lab %>% dbReadTable("ligation") %>% collect()

range <- digs %>% 
  summarise(min = min(quant, na.rm = T), 
    max = max(quant, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(meas1 = min/200, 
    meas2 = max/200)



```
